thread.title: Ed Sheeran Announces Tour - Dates & Venues Revealed!
thread.title_full: Ed Sheeran Announces Tour - Dates & Venues Revealed!

author: Just Jared
title: Ed Sheeran Announces Tour - Dates & Venues Revealed!
text:
Ed Sheeran is officially going out on an arena tour this summer after the smash hit release of his new album Divide .
The 48 dates begin on June 29 and will wrap up on October 6. You can begin purchasing tickets on March 17, and pre-sale begins March 13.
LISTEN HERE: Check Out Ed Sheeran ‘s New Album Divide – Stream It Here! 
Ed will be hitting up major cities including Brooklyn, Los Angeles, Washington, DC, Boston, Nashville, and more.
Click inside for a full list of dates and venues…
